project_descr: UNV, UNDP and the Beijing Volunteer Service Federation (BVF) to create a platform to pioneer regional ‘people-to-people’ cooperation and demonstrate how South-to-South volunteerism can tackle sustainable development challenges.

outputs.output_descr: Phase III project will take the next step of developing the capacity of BVF and other Chinese VIOs to implement overseas projects and strengthen engagement with the international development ecosystem.

project_title: strengthening china’s involvement in the development
